name: Hot German Potato Salad III
author: Tequila
summary: A variation on potato salad - delicious!
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 30 minutes
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Drain, crumble and set aside, reserving drippings
Saute onions in bacon drippings until they are golden-brown
In a small bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, celery seed, and pepper
Add to the sauteed onions and cook and stir until bubbly, then remove from heat
Stir in water and vinegar, then return to the stove and bring to a boil, stirring constantly
Boil and stir for one minute
Carefully stir bacon and sliced potatoes into the vinegar/water mixture, stirring gently until potatoes are heated through
